xdmaps_hw.h File Reference

Detailed Description

This header file contains the hardware interface of an XDmaPs device.

 MODIFICATION HISTORY:

 Ver   Who   Date     Changes
 ----- ----  -------- ----------------------------------------------
 1.00a	hbm   08/18/10 First Release
 1.01a nm    12/20/12 Added definition XDMAPS_CHANNELS_PER_DEV which specifies
		       the maximum number of channels.
		       Replaced the usage of XPAR_XDMAPS_CHANNELS_PER_DEV
                      with XDMAPS_CHANNELS_PER_DEV defined in xdmaps_hw.h
 1.02a sg    05/16/12 Made changes for doxygen
 1.06a kpc   07/10/13 Added function prototype

#include "xil_types.h"
#include "xil_assert.h"
#include "xil_io.h"

Register Map

Register offsets for the DMAC.

#define XDMAPS_DS_OFFSET   0x000
#define XDMAPS_DPC_OFFSET   0x004
#define XDMAPS_INTEN_OFFSET   0X020
#define XDMAPS_ES_OFFSET   0x024
#define XDMAPS_INTSTATUS_OFFSET   0x028
#define XDMAPS_INTCLR_OFFSET   0x02c
#define XDMAPS_FSM_OFFSET   0x030
#define XDMAPS_FSC_OFFSET   0x034
#define XDMAPS_FTM_OFFSET   0x038
#define XDMAPS_FTC0_OFFSET   0x040
#define XDmaPs_FTCn_OFFSET(ch)   (XDMAPS_FTC0_OFFSET + (ch) * 4)
#define XDMAPS_CS0_OFFSET   0x100
#define XDmaPs_CSn_OFFSET(ch)   (XDMAPS_CS0_OFFSET + (ch) * 8)
#define XDMAPS_CPC0_OFFSET   0x104
#define XDmaPs_CPCn_OFFSET(ch)   (XDMAPS_CPC0_OFFSET + (ch) * 8)
#define XDMAPS_SA_0_OFFSET   0x400
#define XDmaPs_SA_n_OFFSET(ch)   (XDMAPS_SA_0_OFFSET + (ch) * 0x20)
#define XDMAPS_DA_0_OFFSET   0x404
#define XDmaPs_DA_n_OFFSET(ch)   (XDMAPS_DA_0_OFFSET + (ch) * 0x20)
#define XDMAPS_CC_0_OFFSET   0x408
#define XDmaPs_CC_n_OFFSET(ch)   (XDMAPS_CC_0_OFFSET + (ch) * 0x20)
#define XDMAPS_LC0_0_OFFSET   0x40C
#define XDmaPs_LC0_n_OFFSET(ch)   (XDMAPS_LC0_0_OFFSET + (ch) * 0x20)
#define XDMAPS_LC1_0_OFFSET   0x410
#define XDmaPs_LC1_n_OFFSET(ch)   (XDMAPS_LC1_0_OFFSET + (ch) * 0x20)
#define XDMAPS_DBGSTATUS_OFFSET   0xD00
#define XDMAPS_DBGCMD_OFFSET   0xD04
#define XDMAPS_DBGINST0_OFFSET   0xD08
#define XDMAPS_DBGINST1_OFFSET   0xD0C
#define XDMAPS_CR0_OFFSET   0xE00
#define XDMAPS_CR1_OFFSET   0xE04
#define XDMAPS_CR2_OFFSET   0xE08
#define XDMAPS_CR3_OFFSET   0xE0C
#define XDMAPS_CR4_OFFSET   0xE10
#define XDMAPS_CRDN_OFFSET   0xE14
#define XDMAPS_PERIPH_ID_0_OFFSET   0xFE0
#define XDMAPS_PERIPH_ID_1_OFFSET   0xFE4
#define XDMAPS_PERIPH_ID_2_OFFSET   0xFE8
#define XDMAPS_PERIPH_ID_3_OFFSET   0xFEC
#define XDMAPS_PCELL_ID_0_OFFSET   0xFF0
#define XDMAPS_PCELL_ID_1_OFFSET   0xFF4
#define XDMAPS_PCELL_ID_2_OFFSET   0xFF8
#define XDMAPS_PCELL_ID_3_OFFSET   0xFFC
#define XDMAPS_DS_DMA_STATUS   0x0F
#define XDMAPS_DS_DMA_STATUS_STOPPED   0x00
#define XDMAPS_DBGSTATUS_BUSY   0x01
#define XDMAPS_CS_ACTIVE_MASK   0x07
#define XDMAPS_CR1_I_CACHE_LEN_MASK   0x07
#define XDmaPs_DBGINST0(b1, b0, ch, dbg_th)   (((b1) << 24) | ((b0) << 16) | (((ch) & 0x7) << 8) | ((dbg_th & 0x1)))

Defines

#define XDmaPs_WriteReg(BaseAddress, RegOffset, RegisterValue)   Xil_Out32((BaseAddress) + (RegOffset), (RegisterValue))

Functions

void XDmaPs_ResetHw (u32 BaseAddr)

Define Documentation

#define XDmaPs_WriteReg (  BaseAddress,
RegOffset,
RegisterValue   )     Xil_Out32((BaseAddress) + (RegOffset), (RegisterValue))
 

Write a DMAC register.

Parameters:
BaseAddress contains the base address of the device.
RegOffset contains the offset from the base address of the device.
RegisterValue is the value to be written to the register.
Returns:
None.
Note:
C-Style signature: void XDmaPs_WriteReg(u32 BaseAddress, int RegOffset, u32 RegisterValue)

Function Documentation

void XDmaPs_ResetHw (  u32  BaseAddress  ) 
 

This function perform the reset sequence to the given dmaps interface by configuring the appropriate control bits in the dmaps specifc registers the dmaps reset squence involves the following steps Disable all the interuupts Clear the pending interrupts Kill all the active channel threads Kill the manager thread

Parameters:
BaseAddress of the interface
Returns:
N/A
Note:
This function will not modify the slcr registers that are relavant for dmaps controller
